cast.overview: The Man With No Name enters the Mexican village of San Miguel in the midst of a power struggle among the three Rojo brothers and sheriff John Baxter. When a regiment of Mexican soldiers bearing gold intended to pay for new weapons is waylaid by the Rojo brothers, the stranger inserts himself into the middle of the long-simmering battle, selling false information to both sides for his own benefit.
cast.title: A Fistful of Dollars

cast.overview: Two bounty hunters both pursue the brutal and sadistic bandit, El Indio, who has a large bounty on his head.
cast.title: For a Few Dollars More

details.biography: Edmondo Tieghi was born on May 17, 1930 in Ferrara, Italy. He was an actor, known for La Cage aux folles (1978), La malavita attacca. La polizia risponde. (1977) and Operazione Kappa: sparate a vista (1977). He died on March 28, 2004 in Rome, Italy.
details.name: Edmondo Tieghi
